betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Lightning Spire[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aMulti Lightning Rod§r

Maximum storage capacity of §c512§r Lightning Rods (I)
Each Lightning Rod produces §c28 MEU§r per lightning strike and stores §c280 MEU§r. 

Consumes §c128L§r Cryotheum band §c72L§r * (the number of lightning rods) Molten Iron every lightning. 

Quantitative input is required. Too much or too little input will lead to failure. 

§r[note]Ignores §cthunderstorm§r weather for power generation[/note]

[warn]Use a §aScrewdriver§r to switch between modes.[/warn]
[warn]Please clear internal cache before outputting lightning rods.[/warn]
[warn]Output all lightning rods before dismantling the machine.[/warn]

[note]Use a §aWire Cutter§r to enable/disable the animation. [/note]
